name: Most Paid Service
query:
select
appointment.service_group,
appointment.service_name as "service name:Data:150",
SUM(sales.grand_total) as "grand total:Currency:150",
SUM(sales.outstanding_amount) as "outstanding amount:Currency:150",
SUM(sales.grand_total) - SUM(sales.outstanding_amount) as "paid amount:Currency:150"
from `tabClient Appointment CT` as appointment
inner join `tabSales Invoice` as sales
on appointment.name = sales.appointment
where appointment_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
and sales.status != "Draft"
and sales.status != "Cancelled"
group by service_name
order by appointment.service_group , SUM(sales.grand_total) DESC
